class.name: RapidXML
class.brief_description: A high-level interface for parsing XML files based on RapidXML. See also [XMLParser].
class.description: A RapidXML-based parser for [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/XML]XML[/url] files, providing a simple and efficient API to parse and query XML data. Before obtaining the data, please first use [method parse_string] or [method parse_file] to parse the XML data.

method.name: parse_file
method.description: Parses an XML file. Returns [code]true[/code] on success, or [code]false[/code] on failure. See also [method parse_string].

method.name: parse_string
method.description: Parses a string containing XML data. Returns [code]true[/code] on success, or [code]false[/code] on failure. [b]Note:[/b] This method clears any previously parsed data.

method.name: get_node_value
method.description: Gets the text value of a node by its path. The path format is [code]root/child/leaf[/code]. Returns an empty string if the node does not exist.

method.name: get_node_attribute
method.description: Gets an attribute of a node by its path. Returns an empty string if the node or attribute does not exist. [b]Note:[/b] For the path format, see [method get_node_value].

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears all parsed XML data and resets the object's state for reuse.

method.name: get_last_error
method.description: Returns the error message from the last parsing attempt. Returns an empty string if there was no error.

method.name: get_child_nodes
method.description: Gets all direct child nodes of a specified node. [b]Note:[/b] For the path format, see [method get_node_value].

method.name: get_node_attributes
method.description: Gets all attributes of a specified node. [b]Note:[/b] For the path format, see [method get_node_value].

method.name: get_root_node_name
method.description: Gets the name of the root node.

method.name: get_all_node_paths
method.description: Gets the paths of all nodes in the document.
